title: i need keys and chests
body: please i need keys i  get every week only chest or one key fragment so please give me some more and my luck is so bad i always get bad skins and all my friends have project skins but i dont have nice skins please riot please

replies.body:
Your loot drop rates depend on a few different factors and the factors for chests and key fragments are a bit different. The system largely relies on both your in-game performance and pure luck. I strongly recommend reading through our [**Hextech Crafting Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide), as it covers the frequent questions we receive.

If you have any questions that the Guide was unable to cover, let me know.
loot is a reward for playing. if you want differnet skins or more skins buy rp
